an6.115:1.3: Being hard to admonish, bad friendship, and a distracted mind.
an6.115:1.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.115:1.7: You should develop being easy to admonish to give up being hard to admonish, good friendship to give up bad friendship, and mindfulness of breathing to give up a distracted mind.
an6.115:1.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
